parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content to prefetch. Exact match is supported.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: **1** to **100000**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID. You can call the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The task status. Valid values:

*   **Complete**: The task is complete.
*   **Refreshing**: The task is running.
*   **Failed**: The task failed.
